title: Going beyond summed stress scores: Correlating global and territorial coronary flow reserve by single photon emission tomography with routine myocardial perfusion imaging
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Abigail CC. Chng, Bryan MH. Keng, Xue Fen Teng, Kok Wei Aik, Muhammad Khairulnizar Azman, Larry R. Natividad, Candice SM. Chong, Packrisamy N. Neela, Ru-San Tan, Lohendran Baskaran, Terrance SJ. Chua, Felix YJ. Keng, Angela S. Koh
